name: Green Bean Casserole
ingredients: 1 can (10 3/4 ounces) Campbell’s Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup
steps: Stir the soup, milk, soy sauce, black pepper, beans and 2/3 cup onions in a 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Bake at 350°F. for 25 minutes or until the bean mixture is hot and bubbling.
Bake for 5 minutes or until the onions are golden brown.
